title: Derive WebSocket Channel Schemas
description: Merged schemas for all WebSocket channels

oneOf.description: Details of the auction, if ongoing.

details.description: Details of the auction, if ongoing.

timestamp.title: timestamp
timestamp.description: Timestamp of the auction result (in milliseconds since epoch).

currency.title: currency
currency.description: Currency of subaccount (for PM margin type).

estimated_bid_price.title: estimated_bid_price
estimated_bid_price.description: Estimated bid price for this liquidation. This value is not scaled by the bid percent, and instead represents the discounted mark value of the whole subaccount. This value will be negative for insolvent auctions.

estimated_discount_pnl.title: estimated_discount_pnl
estimated_discount_pnl.description: Estimated profit relative to `estimated_mtm` if the liquidation is successful, assuming execution at `estimated_percent_bid` and `estimated_bid_price`.

estimated_mtm.title: estimated_mtm
estimated_mtm.description: Estimated mark-to-market value of the subaccount being auctioned off. This value is not scaled by the bid percent, and instead represents the un-discounted mark value of the whole subaccount.

estimated_percent_bid.title: estimated_percent_bid
estimated_percent_bid.description: An estimate for the maximum percent of the subaccount that can be liquidated.

last_seen_trade_id.title: last_seen_trade_id
last_seen_trade_id.description: Last trade ID for the account being auctioned off (to use in the `private/liquidate` endpoint). This value is used to ensure that the state of balances reported in `subaccount_balances` is in sync. A trade ID error from `private/liquidate` indicates that the channel is currently out of sync with the on-chain state of the subaccount due to a pending bid.

margin_type.title: margin_type
margin_type.description: Margin type of the subaccount being auctioned off. It is recommended to bid on subaccounts using the same margin type and currency as to not run into unsupported currency errors or maximum account size limits.

min_cash_transfer.title: min_cash_transfer
min_cash_transfer.description: Suggested minimum amount of cash to transfer to a newly created subaccount for bidding (to use in the `private/liquidate` endpoint). Any unused cash will get returned back to the original subaccount. If the bidder plans to bid less than the `estimated_percent_bid`, they may scale this value down accordingly.

min_price_limit.title: min_price_limit
min_price_limit.description: Estimated minimum `price_limit` (to use in the `private/liquidate` endpoint). This is the minimum amount of cash that would be required to buy out the percent of the subaccount. If the bidder plans to bid less than the `estimated_percent_bid`, they may scale this value down accordingly.

subaccount_balances.title: subaccount_balances
subaccount_balances.description: Current balances of the subaccount being auctioned off. The bidder should expect to receive a percentage of these balances proportional to the `estimated_percent_bid`, and pay `estimated_bid_price * estimated_percent_bid` for them. These balances already include any pending perp settlements and funding payments into the USDC balance.

collaterals.title: collaterals
collaterals.description: All collaterals that count towards margin of subaccount

initial_margin.title: initial_margin
initial_margin.description: Total initial margin requirement of all positions and collaterals.

maintenance_margin.title: maintenance_margin
maintenance_margin.description: Total maintenance margin requirement of all positions and collaterals.If this value falls below zero, the subaccount will be flagged for liquidation.

margin_type.title: margin_type
margin_type.description: Margin type of subaccount (`PM` (Portfolio Margin), `PM2` (Portfolio Margin 2), or `SM` (Standard Margin))

subaccount_value.title: subaccount_value
subaccount_value.description: Total mark-to-market value of all positions and collaterals

valuation_timestamp.title: valuation_timestamp
valuation_timestamp.description: Timestamp (in seconds since epoch) of when margin and MtM were computed.

initial_margin.title: initial_margin
initial_margin.description: USD value of collateral that contributes to initial margin

maintenance_margin.title: maintenance_margin
maintenance_margin.description: USD value of collateral that contributes to maintenance margin

mark_price.title: mark_price
mark_price.description: Current mark price of the asset

mark_value.title: mark_value
mark_value.description: USD value of the collateral (amount * mark price)

delta.title: delta
delta.description: Asset delta (w.r.t. forward price for options, `1.0` for perps)

index_price.title: index_price
index_price.description: Current index (oracle) price for position's currency

initial_margin.title: initial_margin
initial_margin.description: USD initial margin requirement for this position

instrument_name.title: instrument_name
instrument_name.description: Instrument name (same as the base Asset name)

liquidation_price.title: liquidation_price
liquidation_price.description: Index price at which position will be liquidated

maintenance_margin.title: maintenance_margin
maintenance_margin.description: USD maintenance margin requirement for this position

mark_price.title: mark_price
mark_price.description: Current mark price for position's instrument

mark_value.title: mark_value
mark_value.description: USD value of the position; this represents how much USD can be recieved by fully closing the position at the current oracle price

asks.title: asks
asks.description: List of asks as [price, amount] tuples optionally grouped into price buckets

bids.title: bids
bids.description: List of bids as [price, amount] tuples optionally grouped into price buckets

publish_id.title: publish_id
publish_id.description: Publish ID, incremented for each publish

timestamp.title: timestamp
timestamp.description: Timestamp of the spot feed snapshot

confidence_prev_daily.title: confidence_prev_daily
confidence_prev_daily.description: Confidence levels of the price 24 hours ago

price_prev_daily.title: price_prev_daily
price_prev_daily.description: Price of the currency 24 hours ago

timestamp_prev_daily.title: timestamp_prev_daily
timestamp_prev_daily.description: Unix timestamp of the price 24 hours ago

name.title: name
name.description: Name of colletaral asset or instrument

subaccount_id.title: subaccount_id
subaccount_id.description: Subaccount ID to get best quote state updates for

oneOf.description: Error if the the `rfq_get_best_quote` RPC call failed

error.description: Error if the the `rfq_get_best_quote` RPC call failed

oneOf.description: Best quote result for the RFQ, if not an error

result.description: Best quote result for the RFQ, if not an error

rfq_id.title: rfq_id
rfq_id.description: RFQ ID for which the best quote is being published

oneOf.description: Best quote for the RFQ (or null if RFQ is not created yet or quotes do not exist). This object should be used to sign a taker quote and call into `execute_quote` RPC.

best_quote.description: Best quote for the RFQ (or null if RFQ is not created yet or quotes do not exist). This object should be used to sign a taker quote and call into `execute_quote` RPC.

down_liquidation_price.title: down_liquidation_price
down_liquidation_price.description: Liquidation price if the trade were to be filled and the market moves down.

estimated_fee.title: estimated_fee
estimated_fee.description: An estimate for how much the user will pay in fees ($ for the whole trade).

estimated_realized_pnl.title: estimated_realized_pnl
estimated_realized_pnl.description: An estimate for the realized PnL of the trade.

estimated_realized_pnl_excl_fees.title: estimated_realized_pnl_excl_fees
estimated_realized_pnl_excl_fees.description: An estimate for the realized PnL of the trade. with cost basis calculated without considering fees.

estimated_total_cost.title: estimated_total_cost
estimated_total_cost.description: An estimate for the total $ cost of the trade.

filled_pct.title: filled_pct
filled_pct.description: Percentage of the RFQ that has already been filled, from 0 to 1.

invalid_reason.title: invalid_reason
enum: Account is currently under maintenance margin requirements, trading is frozen.
This order would cause account to fall under maintenance margin requirements.
Insufficient buying power, only a single risk-reducing open order is allowed.
Insufficient buying power, consider reducing order size.
Insufficient buying power, consider reducing order size or canceling other orders.
Consider canceling other limit orders or using IOC, FOK, or market orders. This order is risk-reducing, but if filled with other open orders, buying power might be insufficient.
invalid_reason.description: Reason for the RFQ being invalid, if any.

is_valid.title: is_valid
is_valid.description: `True` if RFQ is expected to pass margin requirements.

orderbook_total_cost.title: orderbook_total_cost
orderbook_total_cost.description: Total cost of  the RFQ if it were to be filled at current orderbook prices (same direction as the RFQ). If lower than `estimated_total_cost`, the user may want to use the orderbook instead of RFQs for this order. Will return null if any of the legs do not have orderbook data or enough liquidity for the full fill.

post_initial_margin.title: post_initial_margin
post_initial_margin.description: User's hypothetical margin balance if the trade were to get executed.

post_liquidation_price.title: post_liquidation_price
post_liquidation_price.description: Liquidation price if the trade were to be filled. If both upside and downside liquidation prices exist, returns the closest one to the current index price.

pre_initial_margin.title: pre_initial_margin
pre_initial_margin.description: User's initial margin balance before the trade.

suggested_max_fee.title: suggested_max_fee
suggested_max_fee.description: Recommended value for `max_fee` of the trade.

up_liquidation_price.title: up_liquidation_price
up_liquidation_price.description: Liquidation price if the trade were to be filled and the market moves up.

creation_timestamp.title: creation_timestamp
creation_timestamp.description: Creation timestamp in ms since Unix epoch

fill_pct.title: fill_pct
fill_pct.description: Percentage of the RFQ that this quote would fill, from 0 to 1.

last_update_timestamp.title: last_update_timestamp
last_update_timestamp.description: Last update timestamp in ms since Unix epoch

legs_hash.title: legs_hash
legs_hash.description: Hash of the legs of the best quote to be signed by the taker.

tx_hash.title: tx_hash
tx_hash.description: Blockchain transaction hash (only for executed quotes)

tx_status.title: tx_status
tx_status.description: Blockchain transaction status (only for executed quotes)

wallet.title: wallet
wallet.description: Wallet address of the quote sender

amount.title: amount
amount.description: Amount in units of the base

amount.title: amount
amount.description: Order amount in units of the base

cancel_reason.title: cancel_reason
cancel_reason.description: If cancelled, reason behind order cancellation

creation_timestamp.title: creation_timestamp
creation_timestamp.description: Creation timestamp (in ms since Unix epoch)

filled_amount.title: filled_amount
filled_amount.description: Total filled amount for the order

is_transfer.title: is_transfer
is_transfer.description: Whether the order was generated through `private/transfer_position`

label.title: label
label.description: Optional user-defined label for the order

last_update_timestamp.title: last_update_timestamp
last_update_timestamp.description: Last update timestamp (in ms since Unix epoch)

max_fee.title: max_fee
max_fee.description: Max fee in units of the quote currency

mmp.title: mmp
mmp.description: Whether the order is tagged for market maker protections

nonce.title: nonce
nonce.description: Unique nonce defined as (UTC_timestamp in ms)(random_number_up_to_3_digits) (e.g. 1695836058725001, where 001 is the random number)

order_fee.title: order_fee
order_fee.description: Total order fee paid so far

quote_id.title: quote_id
quote_id.description: Quote ID if the trade was executed via RFQ

replaced_order_id.title: replaced_order_id
replaced_order_id.description: If replaced, ID of the order that was replaced

signer.title: signer
signer.description: Owner wallet address or registered session key that signed order

trigger_price.title: trigger_price
trigger_price.description: (Required for trigger orders) Index or Market price to trigger order at

trigger_price_type.title: trigger_price_type
trigger_price_type.description: (Required for trigger orders) Trigger with Index or Mark Price

trigger_reject_message.title: trigger_reject_message
trigger_reject_message.description: (Required for trigger orders) Error message if error occured during trigger

trigger_type.title: trigger_type
trigger_type.description: (Required for trigger orders) Stop-loss or Take-profit.

subaccount_id.title: subaccount_id
subaccount_id.description: Subaccount ID to get quote state updates for

creation_timestamp.title: creation_timestamp
creation_timestamp.description: Creation timestamp in ms since Unix epoch

fee.title: fee
fee.description: Fee paid for this quote (if executed)

fill_pct.title: fill_pct
fill_pct.description: Percentage of the RFQ that this quote would fill, from 0 to 1.

is_transfer.title: is_transfer
is_transfer.description: Whether the order was generated through `private/transfer_position`

last_update_timestamp.title: last_update_timestamp
last_update_timestamp.description: Last update timestamp in ms since Unix epoch

legs_hash.title: legs_hash
legs_hash.description: Hash of the legs of the best quote to be signed by the taker.

mmp.title: mmp
mmp.description: Whether the quote is tagged for market maker protections (default false)

signer.title: signer
signer.description: Owner wallet address or registered session key that signed the quote

tx_hash.title: tx_hash
tx_hash.description: Blockchain transaction hash (only for executed quotes)

tx_status.title: tx_status
tx_status.description: Blockchain transaction status (only for executed quotes)

index_price.title: index_price
index_price.description: Index price of the underlying at the time of the trade

is_transfer.title: is_transfer
is_transfer.description: Whether the trade was generated through `private/transfer_position`

label.title: label
label.description: Optional user-defined label for the order

liquidity_role.title: liquidity_role
liquidity_role.description: Role of the user in the trade

mark_price.title: mark_price
mark_price.description: Mark price of the instrument at the time of the trade

quote_id.title: quote_id
quote_id.description: Quote ID if the trade was executed via RFQ

realized_pnl_excl_fees.title: realized_pnl_excl_fees
realized_pnl_excl_fees.description: Realized PnL for this trade using cost accounting that excludes fees

timestamp.title: timestamp
timestamp.description: Trade timestamp (in ms since Unix epoch)

trade_price.title: trade_price
trade_price.description: Price at which the trade was filled

transaction_id.title: transaction_id
transaction_id.description: The transaction id of the related settlement transaction

timestamp.title: timestamp
timestamp.description: Timestamp of the ticker feed snapshot

A.title: A
A.description: Amount of contracts / tokens available at best ask price

B.title: B
B.description: Amount of contracts / tokens available at best bid price

maxp.title: maxp
maxp.description: Maximum price at which an agressive buyer can be matched. Any portion of a market order that would execute above this price will be cancelled. A limit buy order with limit price above this value is treated as post only (i.e. it will be rejected if it would cross any existing resting order).

minp.title: minp
minp.description: Minimum price at which an agressive seller can be matched. Any portion of a market order that would execute below this price will be cancelled. A limit sell order with limit price below this value is treated as post only (i.e. it will be rejected if it would cross any existing resting order).

oneOf.description: Greeks, forward price, iv and mark price of the instrument (options only)

option_pricing.description: Greeks, forward price, iv and mark price of the instrument (options only)

stats.description: Aggregate trading stats for the last 24 hours

t.title: t
t.description: Creation timestamp of the snapshot in milliseconds

ai.title: ai
ai.description: Implied volatility of the current best ask

bi.title: bi
bi.description: Implied volatility of the current best bid

df.title: df
df.description: Discount factor used to calculate option premium

f.title: f
f.description: Forward price used to calculate option premium

c.title: c
c.description: Number of contracts traded during last 24 hours

p.title: p
p.description: Options: 24hr percent change in premium; Perps: 24hr percent change in mark price

pr.title: pr
pr.description: Premium volume traded during last 24 hours

v.title: v
v.description: Notional volume traded during last 24 hours

index_price.title: index_price
index_price.description: Index price of the underlying at the time of the trade

mark_price.title: mark_price
mark_price.description: Mark price of the instrument at the time of the trade

quote_id.title: quote_id
quote_id.description: Quote ID if the trade was executed via RFQ

timestamp.title: timestamp
timestamp.description: Trade timestamp (in ms since Unix epoch)

trade_price.title: trade_price
trade_price.description: Price at which the trade was filled

index_price.title: index_price
index_price.description: Index price of the underlying at the time of the trade

liquidity_role.title: liquidity_role
liquidity_role.description: Role of the user in the trade

mark_price.title: mark_price
mark_price.description: Mark price of the instrument at the time of the trade

quote_id.title: quote_id
quote_id.description: Quote ID if the trade was executed via RFQ

realized_pnl_excl_fees.title: realized_pnl_excl_fees
realized_pnl_excl_fees.description: Realized PnL for this trade using cost accounting that excludes fees

timestamp.title: timestamp
timestamp.description: Trade timestamp (in ms since Unix epoch)

trade_price.title: trade_price
trade_price.description: Price at which the trade was filled

creation_timestamp.title: creation_timestamp
creation_timestamp.description: Creation timestamp in ms since Unix epoch

fill_rate.title: fill_rate
fill_rate.description: Average taker fill rate, from 0 to 1. Returns null for users with insufficient RFQ history.

filled_direction.title: filled_direction
filled_direction.description: Direction at which the RFQ was filled (only if filled)

filled_pct.title: filled_pct
filled_pct.description: Percentage of the RFQ that has been filled, from 0 to 1.

last_update_timestamp.title: last_update_timestamp
last_update_timestamp.description: Last update timestamp in ms since Unix epoch

recent_fill_rate.title: recent_fill_rate
recent_fill_rate.description: Taker fill rate, weighted towards the recent several days of activity, from 0 to 1. Returns null for users with insufficient recent RFQ history.

total_cost.title: total_cost
total_cost.description: Total cost for the RFQ (only if filled)

valid_until.title: valid_until
valid_until.description: RFQ expiry timestamp in ms since Unix epoch

wallet.title: wallet
wallet.description: Wallet address of the RFQ sender

amount.title: amount
amount.description: Amount in units of the base
